text: This is a list of Brazilian television related events from 1982. ==Events== ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1970s=== *Turma da Mônica (1976–present) ==Births== *17 February - Mariana Weickert, model & TV host *22 March - Daniel Erthal, actor & model *14 April - Paolla Oliveira, actress *7 June - Bruno Freitas, actor & TV host *20 October - Roberta Rodrigues, actress ==Deaths== ==See also== *1982 in Brazil *List of Brazilian films of 1982
title: 1982 in Brazilian television
